ygData.subject: RE: the darkforged armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok so anybody want to tell me what Armor they offer (and if you really want to make my morning, tell me what is required)... On a side note I ve found out some
ygData.messageBody:
Ok so anybody want to tell me what Armor they offer (and if you really want
to make my morning, tell me what is required)...

On a side note I've found out some of the Jboot quest (ok I never got around
to getting them), besides hunting down some Clops it should be cake...



-----Original Message-----
From: Grant Vanderhule [mailto:vandergm@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 14, 1999 8:32 AM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] the darkforged armor


From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>

indeed, the undead knight mentions only 4 pieces. but remember, there is
only one of him, compared to several npcs for all the other class armor.
search around, there may be an npc we are missing. oh, and while our quests
are truly a cakewalk compared to the other classes (after you figure out how
the f*** to get them started!) be prepared to spend gobs of time in.. cazic
;)

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
